text:
Hi there!

Thanks for using Mike's Repair Shop for your recent service.

Here's what we did:

  Diagnosis fee: $50
  Parts (alternator): $285
  Labor (2 hrs @ $75/hr): $150
  Shop supplies: $15

  Your total comes to: $500 even

Please pay within 7 days (by June 22, 2024).

Job #: MRS-0612-A
Service date: June 15, 2024

Thanks!
- Mike
Mike's Repair Shop
234 Main St
